title: Just awesome,
body:
I have not found any problems with the app yet but just wanted to say how much I enjoy and how useful it is being able to communicate with people I play dynamic questions with while I'm not online. For eg: I'm trying to set up a team for a tourney atm and life is just so much easier coz I don't have to waste time msging when I could be playing I can organise everything easily while on the bus. 
Only requesting have at the moment is a way to add group chats but other than that gj riot

replies.body: I agree, awesome app, but group chat would make it heaps better. Also, being able to view profiles in the app would be amazing.

Same here, this app is very much to my liking :) However, I have one small problem... One bug I found was rhat one moment, my screen froze, then the phone turned off completely, and when I turned it on, it had to turn the whole system up. Anyways, an awesome app!!!
